          <title>
            <string language="sv">Reptillverkning</string>
            <string language="en">Rope making</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Seilbilden</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fabrication de corde</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fazer da corda</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fare della corda</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παραγωγή σχοινιών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fabricación de la cuerda</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Två kvinnor tillverkar rep av kokosfibrer i en liten by i Indien.</string>
            <string language="en">Two women produce ropes made from coconut fibres in a small village in India.</string>
          </description>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zwei Frauen produzieren die Seile, die von den 
Kokosnußfasern in einem kleinen Dorf in Indien gebildet werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Deux femmes produisent des cordes faites à partir
des fibres de noix de coco dans un petit village en Inde.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Duas mulheres produzem as cordas feitas das fibras
do coco em uma vila pequena em India.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Due donne producono le corde fatte dalle fibre 
della noce di cocco in un piccolo villaggio in India.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δύο γυναίκες παράγουν τα σχοινιά που γίνονται από 
τις ίνες καρύδων σε ένα μικρό χωριό στην Ινδία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dos mujeres producen las cuerdas hechas de fibras 
del coco en una aldea pequeña en la India.</string>
          </description>
